project.content:
- **GitHub Repository**: [kiaksarg/Telegram-Channel-Manager-Desktop](https://github.com/kiaksarg/Telegram-Channel-Manager-Desktop)
Telegram Channel Manager Desktop is a Windows app for sending formatted text, URL buttons, files with captions, audio, and more to **Telegram channels, groups, and private chats**.

‚ú® Key Features

  • Send inline URL buttons with messages.
  • Bulk messaging to unlimited channels, groups, and individuals.
  • Supports formatted text (bold, italic, hyperlinks) via HTML and Markdown.
  • Send files, images, videos, and music with editable metadata.
  • Tab-based management for multiple bots.
  • Silent message sending (no notifications).
  • Automatic backup of sent messages.
  • Own Bot Control: Runs using your own bot (no third-party admin rights required).
## üöÄ Getting Started STEP 1. BUILD YOUR BOT WITH [@BotFather](https://t.me/BotFather) STEP 2. PASTE YOUR BOT TOKEN IN THE ‚ÄúBot Token‚Äù TEXT BOX STEP 3. ADD THE BOT TO YOUR CHANNEL AS ADMINISTRATOR STEP 4. SEND MESSAGES TO ONE OR ANY NUMBER OF CHATS ## ‚¨áÔ∏è Download [Download Telegram Channel Manager Desktop v3.0 (ZIP)](https://github.com/kiaksarg/Telegram-Channel-Manager-Desktop/releases/download/3.0/Telegram.Channel.Manager.Desktop.V3.zip)
project.title: Telegram Channel Manager Desktop
project.excerpt: A free, open-source Telegram channel management tool for Windows, supporting URL buttons, bulk messaging, file sending, and more.
